Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Artesian
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield  buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California, 55th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
